# Code Highlighting Test

This document tests Shiki syntax highlighting features.

## Basic Syntax Highlighting

### TypeScript

```typescript
interface User {
  name: string;
  age: number;
  email?: string;
}

function greet(user: User): string {
  return `Hello, ${user.name}!`;
}

const user: User = { name: 'Alice', age: 30 };
console.log(greet(user));
```

### JavaScript

```javascript
const fetchData = async () => {
  const response = await fetch('/api/data');
  const data = await response.json();
  return data;
};

fetchData().then(console.log);
```

### JSX/TSX

```tsx
import React from 'react';

interface ButtonProps {
  label: string;
  onClick: () => void;
}

export function Button({ label, onClick }: ButtonProps) {
  return (
    <button className="btn" onClick={onClick}>
      {label}
    </button>
  );
}
```

```json
    "typescript": "^5.0.0"
  }
}
```

### Bash

```bash
#!/bin/bash
echo "Installing dependencies..."
npm install
npm run build
npm test
```

### Python

```python
def fibonacci(n: int) -> list[int]:
    """Generate Fibonacci sequence up to n terms."""
    if n <= 0:
        return []

    fib = [0, 1]
    while len(fib) < n:
        fib.append(fib[-1] + fib[-2])

    return fib[:n]

print(fibonacci(10))
```

## Meta Features

### Line Numbers

```ts showLineNumbers
const x = 1;
const y = 2;
const z = x + y;
console.log(z);
```

### Line Highlighting

```ts {2,4-5}
function example() {
  const highlighted = true; // This line is highlighted
  const normal = false;
  const alsoHighlighted = 1; // Highlighted
  const andThis = 2; // Highlighted
  const notThis = 3;
}
```

### Title

```ts title="utils/helpers.ts"
export function formatDate(date: Date): string {
  return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US');
}
```

### Combined Meta

```typescript showLineNumbers {1,3} title="config.ts"
const API_URL = 'https://api.example.com'; // highlighted
const TIMEOUT = 5000;
const MAX_RETRIES = 3; // highlighted
```

## Unsupported Language (Falls Back to Plaintext)

```foobar
This is an unknown language.
It should render as plain text.
```

## Diff

```diff
- const oldValue = 1;
+ const newValue = 2;
  const unchanged = 3;
```
